greeting.text: Ahoy! I'm River, the lake ranger. Beautiful day for a stroll by the water, isn't it?

swimming.text: Afraid not - the lake is for viewing only! But feel free to toss a coin and make a wish at the viewpoint. Who knows, it might come true!

fishing.text: Oh yes! We've got some digital fish swimming around. They're shy though - you'll need to wait patiently at the pond edge to spot them!
